scripts.build:html_public: next build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');if(fs.existsSync('html_public')){fs.rmSync('html_public',{recursive:true});}fs.cpSync('out','html_public',{recursive:true});console.log('âœ“ Output copied to html_public');"
scripts.build:root: next build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const outputDir='..';const outDir='out';if(fs.existsSync(outDir)){const files=fs.readdirSync(outDir);files.forEach(file=>{const srcPath=path.join(outDir,file);const destPath=path.join(outputDir,file);if(fs.existsSync(destPath)){if(fs.statSync(destPath).isDirectory()){fs.rmSync(destPath,{recursive:true});}else{fs.unlinkSync(destPath);}}fs.cpSync(srcPath,destPath,{recursive:true});});console.log('Build output copied directly to repo root');}"
